title: 58 Ways to be Happy
brief: A game-changing new treatment is giving women back control of their bodies as well as their sexual desire.
author: Tatler

title: The Oshot Phenomenon
brief: Women are paying £1000 to have their own blood injected into their vaginas in a bid to boost orgasms. Surgeons claim the procedure can revive your sex life.
author: Alison Maloney

title: Would YOU do this to increase your SEX DRIVE?
brief: OUCH: Women are going to new extremes to revive their libido… but is it worth it?
author: Lizzie Mulherin

title: Want more orgasms? Get the 'O-shot'
brief: £1,000 injection can boost your love life, experts claim
author: Stephen Matthews

title: I had a vampire vagina injection to get my libido back
brief: Kim Kardashian had a vampire facial - but Sophia* had a version of the treatment to get her libido back...
author: Lynne Hyland

title: How does the vaginal injection work?
brief: The O-Shot is helping women across the country achieve orgasm and fix sexual dysfunction, but how does it work?
author: Ciara Sheppard

title: Dr Sherif Wakil launches sexual wellbeing association
brief: Aesthetic practitioner Dr Sherif Wakil has launched The International Association of Aesthetic Gynaecology and Sexual Wellbeing (IAAGSW).
author: Aesthetic Journal

title: The Shape of Things to Come
brief: Who is Dr Sherif Wakil and Why is the O Concept revolutionizing the sexual desire?
author: MilliOnAir
